about_the_game:
This is a casual and fun game with a cute cartoon style. In the game, players need to cut the rope and let the candy fall into the mouth of the cute little monster. As the level increases, the difficulty of the game also increases, which tests the player's observation ability and also requires some physical knowledge.

Game gameplay

This is a very interesting casual game with three levels. Different methods will have different results! Testing your operational skills and making accurate judgments is crucial for successful clearance!

Players need to cut ropes (with the left mouse button) to complete the task.

Players need to hold down the left mouse button and slide. Used to cut iron chains.

The candy is on the iron chain.

The iron chain will remain in a swinging state.

You need to ensure that the candy can accurately fall into the little monster's mouth!

Then you can enter the next level!

Game features:

The game features multiple colors and a cute 2D graphics style.

2. Extremely exquisite game graphics!

name: King of the Times

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB AMD Radeon HD 6870, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 745 or better
